name: People fully vaccinated, per hundred (cumulative) - Age group 75+
descriptionShort: Total number of 75+ COVID-19 vaccination doses administered.
descriptionProcessing: Per-capita values have been estimated using UN WPP (2022 review) data for year 2021.

origins.title: COVID-19, vaccinations (broken down by age)
origins.description:
Country-by-country data on global COVID-19 vaccinations by age. We only rely on figures that are verifiable based on public official sources.

The data produced by third parties and made available by Our World in Data is subject to the license terms from the original third-party authors. We will always indicate the original source of the data in our database, and you should always check the license of any such third-party data before use.
origins.producer: Official data collated by Our World in Data
origins.citationFull:
Mathieu, E., Ritchie, H., Ortiz-Ospina, E. et al. A global database of COVID-19 vaccinations. Nat Hum Behav (2021). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41562-021-01122-8

The data has been obtained from different sources depending on the country:

- Argentina: Ministry of Health via https://covidstats.com.ar/ws/vacunadosargentina?portipovacuna=1 (https://covidstats.com.ar/)
- Australia: Ministry of Health via covidbaseau.com (https://covidbaseau.com/)
- Austria: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Belgium: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Bulgaria: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Canada: Public Health Agency of Canada (https://health-infobase.canada.ca/covid-19/vaccination-coverage/)
- Croatia: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Cyprus: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Czechia: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Denmark: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Estonia: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Finland: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- France: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Germany: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Hong Kong: Food and Health Bureau (https://data.gov.hk/en-data/dataset/hk-dh-chpsebcddr-novel-infectious-agent)
- Hungary: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Iceland: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Ireland: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Israel: Ministry of Health via github.com/dancarmoz/israel_moh_covid_dashboard_data (https://github.com/dancarmoz/israel_moh_covid_dashboard_data/raw/master/vaccinated_by_age.csv)
- Italy: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Japan: Prime Minister's Office (https://www.kantei.go.jp/jp/headline/kansensho/vaccine.html)
- Jersey: Government of Jersey (https://www.gov.je/Datasets/ListOpenData?ListName=COVID19Weekly&clean=true)
- Latvia: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Liechtenstein: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Lithuania: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Luxembourg: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Malta: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Netherlands: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Norway: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Peru: Ministerio de Salud via https://github.com/jmcastagnetto/covid-19-peru-vacunas (https://www.datosabiertos.gob.pe/dataset/vacunacion)
- Poland: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Portugal: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Romania: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Slovakia: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Slovenia: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Spain: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Sweden: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) (https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/data-covid-19-vaccination-eu-eea)
- Switzerland: Federal Office of Public Health (https://opendata.swiss/en/dataset/covid-19-schweiz)
- Uruguay: Ministry of Health via vacuna.uy (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3dgiordano/covid-19-uy-vacc-data/main/data/Age.csv)
